bio.summary: A highly motivated Full-Stack Developer with 4+ Years of experience in developing and implementing user-friendly websites and applications using React, NextJS and Magento2. Skilled in developing responsive and interactive web designs, proficient in JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Magento2, ReactJS And Next.JS.
bio.description: Possessing strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with a passion for staying up-to-date with the latest technologies and trends in the industry. Seeking a challenging role in a dynamic organization where I can utilize my skills and expertise in Frontend development to deliver exceptional solutions.
